scripts.test:all: yarn test; yarn test:deploy; yarn test:release
scripts.deploy:local: dotnet publish GFK.Image -c Release -o pub/GFK.Image --nologo; dotnet publish GFK.Image.cmd -c Release -o pub/GFK.Image/cmd --nologo
scripts.deploy:user: $publishPath = Join-Path ([System.Environment]::GetFolderPath('MyDocuments')) 'PowerShell' 'modules' 'GFK.Image'; dotnet publish GFK.Image -o $publishPath --nologo; dotnet publish GFK.Image.cmd -o (Join-Path $publishPath cmd) --nologo
scripts.docs:md: yarn deploy:local; Import-Module ./pub/GFK.Image/GFK.Image.psd1; Install-Module platyPS -Force; Update-MarkdownHelp docs
